definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: The same sex, the real human self-love.
sentences.chinese: 同性愛，實質是人類的自愛。

sentences.english: Storytellers enshrined gay love tales in the Thousand and One Nights.
sentences.chinese: 《一千零一夜》中也有同性愛的故事流傳下來。

sentences.english: What evidence proved the same sex love will only bring us disaster?
sentences.chinese: 何條證據又能證明同性愛只會給我們帶來災難？

sentences.english: When the global prevalence of the same sex, mankind really into the joint.
sentences.chinese: 當同性愛盛行全球的時候，人類才真正走向聯合。

sentences.english: Special emphasis should be placed on creating a relaxed working environment for them.
sentences.chinese: 特別是應爲同性愛中的志願者提供寬鬆的工作環境。

sentences.english: Lesbianism was considered a crime against nature.
sentences.chinese: 同性愛被看作是一種違反自然的罪過。
